title: [Balcony of Spiritual Knowledge]
description: Rising several handspans from the smooth floor, a lapis lazuli and travertine railing encircles the balcony that is exposed to the open air.  Stretching upon the horizon is a sprawling city, while nearer at hand and far below is the bright cobalt blue Garden of the Spirit.  An illuminated teleportation disk recessed into the ground flashes with a steady pulse and fills the air with a gentle humming sound.
